patthana14.30:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana14.30:0.3_0: But he deposited his own opportunities;
patthana14.30:1.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
patthana14.30:4.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. ...
patthana14.30:5.1_0: (The Teaching should not be expanded with the Teaching.)
